promptPrefix:
Create a Curriculum in [TARGETLANGUAGE] on the topic of [PROMPT]. 
Grade Level, Recommended Age,
Curriculum Description, Curriculum Goals, Curriculum Outline, 
Show LESSONS for each week for up to 36 weeks.

Give a detailed description of each topic and portfolio ideas for evaluation, with step-by-step instructions on how to teach each topic, give examples for each topic and sample lessons. 

Add Assessment, 3 Recommended Textbooks, Materials, Websites and other helpful Resources, add a note for Parent.

Create a schedule that will last 1 school year.
title: Curriculum Creator
